mapper.update: update bus_line_info set start_date = #{startDate} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.centreId,a.centreMark,a.userNo,a.createDate from bus_centre_advice a where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) <= date(a.createDate) order by a.createDate DESC

select a.id as openId , a.siteId , b.siteName,a.userNo as openUserNo, a.createDate as openDate,c.id as adviceId, c.userNo as openReplyUserNo, c.replyContent as openReplyContent, c.delMark as openDelMark from BUS_OPEN_LINE a LEFT JOIN BUS_EVALUATION_ADVICE c ON c.openId = a.id, BUS_NEWS_SITE b where a.siteId = b.id
and a.id = #{id}
select a.id,a.centreId,a.centreMark,a.userNo,a.createDate from bus_centre_advice a where a.userNo = #{userNo} order by a.createDate DESC
select EMPID ,empcode as userNo,EMPNAME from om_employee where empcode = #{userNo}
select id,line_name as lineName, apply_name as applyName,user_name as userName, tel,remark ,start_date as startDate from BUS_LINE_INFO where id = #{id}

select line_id as lineId ,site_id as siteId, is_start as isStart,is_end as isEnd, site_sort as siteSort,is_act as isAct, remark
from BUS_LINE_OF_SITE where line_id = #{lineId}
